Class MatrixHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • MatrixHandler

  • public class MatrixHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    We define columns first and rows second (x,y)

    • Method Detail

      • getCloseCol

        public int getCloseCol(Direction direc,
              int position)
        Parameters:
        direc - Which direction to look for the closest filled cell on the same row
        position - The cell number (in position number format)
        Returns:
        Index of column the closest filled cell is in or -1 if there are none (borders = restrictions)

      • getCloseRow

        public int getCloseRow(Direction direc,
              int position)
        Parameters:
        direc - Which direction to look for the closest filled cell on the same col
        position - The cell coordinates which contain x and y
        Returns:
        Index of row the closest filled cell is in or -1 if there are none (borders = restrictions)

      • clearRow

        public void clearRow(int row)
        Parameters:
        row - Index of the row This method sets the value of each cell in the row to zero

      • moveRow

        public void moveRow(int row)
        Parameters:
        index - of row the line above will be moved to. Precondition: Row > 0 This method copies the row from above to one row below

      • isRowFilled

        public boolean isRowFilled(int row)
        Parameters:
        row - The index of the row that should be checked
        Returns:
        True if row is filled

      • isColFilled

        public boolean isColFilled(int col)
        Parameters:
        row - The index of the column that should be checked
        Returns:
        True if column is filled

      • isŔowEmpty

        public boolean isŔowEmpty(int row)
        Parameters:
        row - index of row to check
        Returns:
        True if every element in the row is 0

      • isColEmpty

        public boolean isColEmpty(int col)
        Parameters:
        column - col index of column to check
        Returns:
        True if every element in the column is 0
